LogisticsSecond.title: SAFETY – OUR NUMBER ONE PRIORITY
content: Transport safety is a fundamental pillar for us.
We understand that relocation can be a complex and stressful process, which is why we offer professional guidance to ensure a smooth and efficient transition.

Subservices.title: OUR FLEET
Subservices.intro: From trucks of various sizes to oversized trailers and tipper semi-trailers, we offer solutions for any type of cargo.

fleetMini.title: LIGHT FLEET
fleetMini.description: Choose from multiple compact vehicles — ideal for urban distribution and fast deliveries.

sprinter.title: Curtain-Sider/Box Sprinter (GVW 3.5T)
sprinter.description: This compact yet powerful vehicle is ideal for transporting general cargo such as parcels or consumer goods. With a 3.5-ton load capacity, it is perfect for fast urban deliveries or short-distance routes. We hold licenses for 3.5-ton transport.

van75.title: Curtain-Sider/Box Truck (GVW 7.5T)
van75.description: A larger-capacity vehicle suitable for heavier or bulkier goods. It can transport a wide variety of cargo, from industrial equipment to construction materials. Its main advantage is its ability to access tighter areas while ensuring efficient medium-distance deliveries.

van10.title: Curtain-Sider/Box Truck (GVW 7.5–40T)
van10.description: The strongest link in our fleet. With a load capacity of up to 40 tons, this truck is built for long-distance transport of heavy and bulky goods. Due to its size, it can safely transport oversized cargo, bulk materials, or containers.

marfa_generala.title: General Cargo
marfa_generala.description: General cargo includes products that do not require special transport conditions. Whether it’s electronics, textiles, food products, or any other non-restricted goods, we ensure each item reaches its destination in perfect condition.
marfa_generala.imageAlt: Pallets with goods in a warehouse

agabaritic.title: Oversized Trailer
agabaritic.description: In the transport and logistics industry, oversized trailers are essential for carrying out complex operations. We use these trailers to transport goods that exceed standard dimensions and weights. Whether it's massive machinery, industrial structures, or large equipment, everything is transported with maximum safety and efficiency. Our oversized trailers are equipped with the latest safety systems and built with robust construction for safe and efficient operations. They can be adapted to suit various types of cargo, and their load capacity is impressive.

marafa_agabaritica.title: Oversized Cargo
marafa_agabaritica.description: Handling oversized cargo begins with a thorough analysis of its dimensions and weight to determine the required equipment and the optimal route. This is followed by preparing the cargo for transport, which includes packaging and securing it. Transport is carried out with specialized equipment and vehicles capable of handling heavy weights and large dimensions. When traveling through areas with limited access, special convoys may be used. Finally, the cargo is delivered to the destination in accordance with oversized transport legislation, and unloaded using the appropriate equipment.
marafa_agabaritica.imageAlt: Oversized trailer loaded with heavy machinery

camion_cu_semiremorca_basculabila.title: Tipper Semi-Trailer Truck
camion_cu_semiremorca_basculabila.description: These are ideal for transporting solid materials such as sand, grains, or waste, thanks to their specialized design that allows for fast and efficient unloading. This makes tipper trucks a practical and effective solution for many transport tasks.

marfa_vrac_basculanta.title: Bulk Cargo – Tipper
marfa_vrac_basculanta.description: Bulk cargo transport with a tipper truck is commonly used for solid products such as grains, minerals, or construction materials. This fleet type can carry large quantities in a single trip, while the unloading process is extremely fast, reducing overall loading/unloading time.

sasiu_container.title: Container Chassis
sasiu_container.description: A container chassis is essential in the transport industry, offering an efficient and safe solution for containerized cargo. Built to withstand heavy loads, its capacity varies depending on the chassis model.

containere.title: Containers
containere.description: Containerized transport is essential for many modern commercial operations. At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the importance of container logistics and are specialized in handling this type of service. Whether it’s standard 20- or 40-foot containers, or special containers for dangerous goods or refrigerated products, our professional team is ready to manage any container type.

cisterna_pentru_lichide.title: Liquid Tanker
cisterna_pentru_lichide.description: Liquid transport is a specialized branch of logistics that requires increased attention and expertise. Whether it’s food-grade liquids, chemicals, or other fluids, this type of transport demands high precision. With our specially equipped tankers, Crystal Logistics Services ensures sealed and safe transport, essential for preserving liquid quality and integrity.

marafa_lichida_cisterna.title: Liquid Cargo – Tanker
marafa_lichida_cisterna.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand the complexity and sensitivity of transporting liquid goods, from food products such as wine or oil to chemicals or petroleum-based materials. Each requires specific care and preparation, and we ensure safe transport in specialized and secure tank containers.

platforma_pentru_transport_autoturisme.title: Car Transport Platform
platforma_pentru_transport_autoturisme.description: We provide efficient solutions for individual or batch vehicle transport. Whether you're moving a single car or an entire fleet, our platforms are ready to meet your needs. Efficiency and cost-effectiveness remain our priorities so you can save time and money without compromising safety.

autoturisme_platforma_pentru_auto.title: Cars – AUTO Platform
autoturisme_platforma_pentru_auto.description: Car transport is a complex process that requires great attention at every stage—from loading to unloading. At Crystal Logistics Services, we use specialized auto transport platforms that securely fix vehicles to prevent movement during transport, ensuring they arrive in the exact condition they were handed over.

camion_pentru_marfuri_periculoase.title: Dangerous Goods Truck
camion_pentru_marfuri_periculoase.description: Dangerous goods include materials or substances that can endanger human health, safety, or the environment during transport. Their transport is regulated by ADR — a set of international rules defining specific requirements for packaging, labeling, and transporting such goods.

marfa_periculoasa_adr.title: Dangerous Goods (ADR)
marfa_periculoasa_adr.description: Transporting dangerous goods requires increased caution and extensive expertise. At Crystal Logistics Services, we strictly follow international regulations, ensuring every product is correctly packaged, labeled, and transported under maximum safety conditions. We apply strict procedures and use specialized equipment to protect both our staff and the transported cargo.

camion_frigorific_frigo.title: Refrigerated Truck (FRIGO)
camion_frigorific_frigo.description: In transport and logistics, fleet adaptability is crucial. We have equipped our trucks with state-of-the-art refrigeration technology to transport chilled or frozen goods. This allows us to adapt to the specific temperature requirements of each shipment and provide tailored solutions, ensuring cargo arrives in perfect condition.

marfa_frigorifica_frigo.title: Refrigerated/Frozen Goods (FRIGO)
marfa_frigorifica_frigo.description: Our specialized refrigerated vehicles are equipped with advanced thermal insulation and temperature-control systems. We transport meat and meat products, dairy, fruits, vegetables, pastries, eggs, beverages, and more — under optimal conditions based on each cargo’s requirements.

highlight.title: TRANSPORT OPTIONS
highlight.description: At Crystal Logistics Services, we understand that every shipment has unique transport requirements, which is why we offer a variety of platform types to accommodate all needs. Not all goods are the same, and some require special loading and unloading procedures. Our transport platforms can be adapted to meet diverse requirements.

card1.title: Full Truckload – FTL
card1.description: FTL is the ideal option when you have a large volume of cargo that must be delivered quickly and efficiently. In this case, the truck is dedicated exclusively to your shipment. For such transport operations, we provide optimized routing and on-time delivery.

card2.title: Less Than Truckload – LTL
card2.description: LTL is designed for smaller shipments that do not fill an entire truck. By combining goods from multiple clients, we ensure competitive pricing and timely delivery. Our freight forwarding services connect companies with efficient road freight solutions through major transport networks.

vehicles.title: Features of our car transport services
vehicles.description: We understand that each client has specific needs, which is why we offer adaptable platform-based car transport solutions. Whether it’s timing, location, or vehicle type, our team is ready to provide the most suitable solutions.

card1.title: Safety First

card2.title: Extended Geographic Coverage
descriptions: Our car transport services cover a wide range of national and international destinations. We transport vehicles across numerous countries and regions with no significant geographical limitations.

card3.title: Full Insurance Coverage
descriptions: All our car transports are fully insured, providing you with complete peace of mind.

Accordion.title: Benefits of partnering with Crystal Logistics Services
Accordion.intro: Discover why more and more carriers choose Crystal Logistics to increase their efficiency and revenue. Join us and enjoy the advantages of a strong partnership.

class1.title: Access to thousands of loads every day

Our vast client network allows us to offer continuous transport opportunities both nationally and across the EU. Our freight offers are updated in real time, enabling you to make quick decisions and keep your trucks moving. Moreover, we not only provide access to thousands of loads, but also offer dedicated teams that support you throughout every transport.

This type of contract offers flexibility in choosing routes and transport types — whether it’s domestic, round-trip, or EU-wide transport — we provide constant loads and fast payments for every kilometer driven.

class3.title: Fast and guaranteed payments
paragraphs: One of the greatest advantages we offer to our partner carriers is fast and guaranteed payment. We understand how important it is for your business to maintain steady cash flow, and we commit to ensuring it through quick and efficient payment terms.
At Crystal Logistics, you can rely on punctual payments regardless of the contract type. We handle all administrative aspects so you can focus on what matters most — operating your fleet efficiently.

class4.title: Additional benefits and reimbursed expenses
paragraphs: With Crystal Logistics Services, you enjoy not only fast and guaranteed payments but also multiple additional benefits. We offer attractive bonuses for extra loading and unloading, significantly increasing profit per route.

paragraphs: Expanding your fleet can be costly, but Crystal Logistics Services offers an efficient alternative — renting semi-trailers when needed. This allows you to quickly respond to market demand without major upfront investments.

paragraphs: Reducing operational expenses is a priority for every carrier, and Crystal Logistics Services helps you achieve this by offering fuel cards. These allow you to purchase fuel at preferential prices, reducing the cost per route.
By using our fuel cards, you can optimize expenses and increase long-term profitability.

This flexibility allows you to adapt your fleet activity according to market demand and your operational capacity, maximizing efficiency and increasing revenue.

Accordion2.title: How does the collaboration contract with Crystal Logistics Services work?
Accordion2.intro: At Crystal Logistics, we offer carriers the flexibility to choose the type of contract that best suits their preferences and business goals. We offer three collaboration models, each with specific benefits designed to ensure financial stability and consistent income.

class_a.title: 1. Round-Trip (Import-Export) – International routes with guaranteed kilometers
class_a.short: Round-trip transport involves international routes where your trucks travel between Romania and various EU countries, as well as non-EU destinations. These routes are ideal for carriers seeking a mix of international and domestic operations, offering significant advantages:
paragraphs: Included destinations:
Guaranteed kilometers:
Fast payments:
Additional benefits:
listItems: Most EU countries such as Germany, France, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium, Austria, Hungary, Bulgaria, Greece, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Croatia, Slovenia, as well as non-EU countries: Switzerland (CH), Turkey (TR), United Kingdom (GB), Norway (NO).
We guarantee a minimum number of kilometers each month so your fleet has stable and predictable income.
You benefit from guaranteed, fast, and delay-free payments, ensuring strong financial stability.
Access to thousands of loads, bonuses for additional loading operations, and reimbursement of operational expenses (tolls, bridges, ports).

class_b.title: 2. EU Community – Exclusive international transport across Europe
class_b.short: Community-based collaboration is designed for carriers who want to operate exclusively on international EU routes without returning to Romania for extended periods. This option is ideal for maximizing earnings and optimizing operations.
paragraphs: Collaboration duration:
Road taxes:
Highest earning potential:
Financial stability and security:
listItems: 2 months of continuous transport across Europe, covering multiple countries and destinations.
Within this contract model, Crystal Logistics covers all road taxes separately, significantly reducing your operational costs.
Community transport offers the highest earning potential due to the large number of kilometers and constant cargo volumes.
Alongside fast and secure payments, we offer permanent assistance and 24/7 dispatch support so you can focus on your operations without worries.

class_c.title: 3. Domestic – Exclusive national transport
class_c.short: For carriers who prefer exclusively domestic operations, the Domestic collaboration model is the simplest and most efficient solution. It allows you to focus on local routes, covering transport demand across Romania.
paragraphs: Long-term stability:
Reduced operating costs:
Fast and efficient solutions:
listItems: We offer access to spot loads and national transport contracts, ensuring regular routes and consistent income.
Because it’s domestic transport, operational costs — including road taxes and additional expenses — are lower, resulting in higher profit per route.
Through our extensive client network across Romania, your trucks will never remain idle. We ensure efficient route planning to optimize every day of operation.

standard.title: STANDARD
standard.description: A rectangular metal container with standardized dimensions, designed for safe and efficient transport across sea, rail and road.

openTop.title: OPEN TOP
openTop.description: Similar to Standard containers but with an open top. Tarpaulins allow easy loading and unloading of oversized or unconventional cargo.

flatRack.title: FLAT RACK
flatRack.description: These containers have no side or top walls, only a base frame and corner posts. They allow transport of oversized cargo that exceeds standard container dimensions.

reefer.title: REEFER
reefer.description: Equipped with refrigeration and heating systems to maintain controlled temperature. Used for perishable goods such as food, medicine, chemicals, etc.

highCube.title: HIGH CUBE
highCube.description: Higher than Standard containers, providing additional loading space. Ideal for transporting high-volume, low-weight cargo.

Packaging.title: What is multimodal transport?
introParagraphs: Multimodal transport represents a transport system that combines two or more different modes of transport to move goods from one point to another.
This type of transport can include various combinations of road, sea, air or rail transport, depending on the specific needs of the clients and the available infrastructure.

groups.text: The goods are first transported by truck from the production site to a port.
There, the cargo is loaded into a sea container and shipped to another port.
Upon arrival, the goods are unloaded and transported by train to the final destination.

Packaging.title: PACKAGING OF DANGEROUS GOODS AND PACKAGE MARKING
introParagraphs: Dangerous substances are classified and grouped according to ADR, based on their hazard level. This classification helps us understand the specific packaging requirements for each type of cargo and choose the proper solutions to protect both the load and the environment.
Packages must be designed to withstand transport conditions and prevent leaks or damage. ADR packaging instructions specify the performance level required for each type of container.
outroParagraphs: Packages undergo rigorous testing to ensure they meet ADR regulatory requirements, including visible markings and labels that quickly communicate the nature of the hazard and handling instructions.

Safety.title: SAFETY – OUR NUMBER ONE PRIORITY
introParagraphs: In the field of transporting dangerous goods, safety is not just a priority—it is essential. Failure to comply with the regulations can lead to serious consequences, from fines and operational delays to major incidents.

Our drivers are trained and periodically evaluated to ensure they can safely and efficiently handle hazardous goods. The trucks are inspected and certified to guarantee they are equipped appropriately for the type of cargo transported.
Additionally, you can benefit from the support of a specialized safety adviser, who ensures full compliance with legal requirements and assists you in planning and documenting ADR transports.

highlight.title: CHOOSE THE IDEAL TRANSPORT SOLUTION FOR DANGEROUS GOODS
highlight.description: Every ADR project is different. That’s why we offer flexible solutions covering both groupage (LTL) and full truckload (FTL) transport, depending on the volume and type of cargo.

card1.title: GROUPAGE TRANSPORT (LTL)
card1.description: Ideal for smaller quantities of ADR dangerous goods. Combining multiple loads into one truck makes transport efficient and cost-effective while maintaining safety standards.

card2.title: EXCLUSIVE TRANSPORT (FTL)
card2.description: The right solution for large quantities or high-risk goods. The entire truck is dedicated to a single load, offering maximum control over the route and delivery time.

card1.title: CURTAIN-SIDER TRUCKS
card1.short: A versatile solution for palletized dangerous goods.
descriptions: Curtain-sider trucks are ideal for transporting ADR dangerous goods packed in boxes or on pallets.
They offer protection from the elements and easy access for loading and unloading.

card2.title: BOX TRUCKS
descriptions: With a rigid and robust body, box trucks are designed to protect sensitive and hazardous goods.
They provide increased safety and better control during handling.

card3.title: TANKERS
card3.short: For hazardous liquids, gases, and powders.
descriptions: ADR tankers are equipped for the safe transport of dangerous liquids, gases, and powders.
They feature specialized equipment and valves, compliant with current ADR regulations.
